body:
Hey!

This holiday season, why don't we get the community together and have a "xmas" party! This could be hosted via TS by using The Player's place. We could chat, talk. This is a good way to get the community together, and just relax. Comment what you think!

~EDJM9

title: Getting the Community Together This Season
